name: 808_guy
body:
Hey there,

Has there been any forward movement on a “resurrection” of zx6e.net? I’m looking at starting up a new website to pick up where zx6e.net left off…I have a lot of the stickies and valuable information that I had saved over the years. I wanted to avoid a duplication of effort…hence why I’m asking whether this project ever got off the ground.

Thanks!

Justin

name: Green Magic Man
body:
Hi all:
This is Green Magic Man.
I just emailed directly Kelly above, he knows my direct email now. I am still trying to get a complete copy of the site from Pengaru and waiting for him to get back to me. I want that site back too!!!

name: joerocket693
body: Joerocket693 here from zx6e.net. i miss the site too. Sold my zx6e a few YEARS back but was trying to keep in touch with the group. Site was such a great resource.

name: Kmp444
body:
GMM,

This Kelly with the 98 ZX6e from NJ. Can you send me an email and let me know what happen to ZX6e.net?

Thank you Kelly
Kmp444@hotmail.com

name: 6E Keeper
body: Owner of a ’95 ZX6E and would also like to know what happened to ZX6e.net? It’s a great source of information and would be saddened if it was all lost. Thanks.

name: tracey pooh
body:
hi Kelly and Keeper,

I’m very sorry to say that I think, after looking around web and checking with Green Magic Man, that the forum is sadly just plain gone. That is pretty horrific/terrible, I’m a little stunned. As an Archivist (major programmer at archive.org) this saddens me greatly. You can still find some of our crawled versions of some of the pages here:

https://web.archive.org/web/*/http://zx6e.net

It’s really a shame — if they gave members some notice, we would have happily crawled it to the bottom and made sure it got saved in our archives fully…

name: Brad
body: So did they just pull the plug on the server?? I would be willing to host it if needed as it was a great site

name: tracey pooh
body:
yah, they pulled the plug.
Green Magic Man is looking in to trying to see if he can bring it back from the dead on another server, possibly another forum posting technology…
but that’s going to take some time…
